com.spid.android.sdk.request

Class SPiDRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Void,SPiDResponse>
      • com.spid.android.sdk.request.SPiDRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SPiDApiGetRequest, SPiDApiPostRequest, SPiDTokenRequest

    public class SPiDRequest
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Void,SPiDResponse>
    Contains a request to SPiD. Note that each request can only be used once since it extends AsyncTask

        protected void onPostExecute(SPiDResponse response)
